description: This is an HTML file serving as the frontend interface for a database visualization system. It includes embedded CSS for styling and JavaScript for dynamic interactions such as fetching database lists, tables, and data, and rendering them in an interactive UI.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading it and resetting UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles display of tables for a selected database, loading their data.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a specific database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data rows for a specific table within a database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data rows into an HTML table, including handling wide or object data types.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long strings or objects.

methods.name: setActiveState
methods.description: Updates UI to reflect active or selected items.

methods.name: showLoading
methods.description: Displays a loading indicator within a specified element.

methods.name: showError
methods.description: Displays an error message within a specified element.

methods.name: showEmptyState
methods.description: Displays a message indicating no data is available.
